title: SYMHC Classics: Pauline Sabin
itunes:title: SYMHC Classics: Pauline Sabin
description:
This 2018 episode covers a key figure in the battle over Prohibition, which was is often framed as a battle of the sexes, with women serving as the moral voice of sobriety. But Pauline Sabin is often credited as being one of the major activists behind Prohibition's repeal.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
